title: champion skins based on copyrighted material ?
body:
Just wondering about your thoughts about what kind of skins you would want to see if it was based on copyrighted material.

I think I posted something about this earlier but I'm still so set on a Cersei Lannister Gangplank skin, with red wine to replace oranges, wildfire barrels, and a Euron Greyjoy laugh for ulti xd.

replies.body:
Boy oh boy, so much potential.

Hmm...

I guess you could do a "Speedy Ashe" based on the character as portrayed in the currently running DC show Arrow, which could be interesting.
An "Iron Fist Lee Sin" would be pretty cool. Though, that's basically God Fist Lee Sin, isn't it? All he's really missing is the dragon tattoo.
Could have a "Leonidas Pantheon", not sure what to think about that idea.
An "Ezio [Auditori Da Farenze] Talon" might work.

Oh, oh, oh!
Could totally do a "Once Upon a Time" themed skin line (fyi, I'm talking about the show).
Garen and Ashe could be Prince Charming and Snow White (respectively, obviously).
Syndra would probably work best as Regina (AKA the Evil Queen)
Shyvanna would totally work as Maleficent.
Gangplank would be a great Killian "Hook" Jones.
Lux could pull of an Emma Swan.
Shaco would probably be the best thematic fit for Rumplestiltskin.
Nami could be Ariel (totally not a race thing...)
Zoe would work as Alice (yes, Alice from Wonderland [and other places])
Ryze would work as the Sorcerer's Apprentice (or, hell, the Sorcerer himself, Merlin).
LeBlanc could be Cora, I suppose.

And I've drawn a blank... Guess that's all, folks.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K3Gn6X0f,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-24T13:56:24.998+0000)
>
> Boy oh boy, so much potential.
> 
> Hmm...
> 
> I guess you could do a "Speedy Ashe" based on the character as portrayed in the currently running DC show Arrow, which could be interesting.

> Could have a "Leonidas Pantheon", not sure what to think about that idea.
> An "Ezio [Auditori Da Farenze] Talon" might work.

> Oh, oh, oh!
> Could totally do a "Once Upon a Time" themed skin line (fyi, I'm talking about the show).
> Garen and Ashe could be Prince Charming and Snow White (respectively, obviously).
> Syndra would probably work best as Regina (AKA the Evil Queen)
> Shyvanna would totally work as Maleficent.
> Gangplank would be a great Killian "Hook" Jones.
> Lux could pull of an Emma Swan.
> Shaco would probably be the best thematic fit for Rumplestiltskin.
> Nami could be Ariel (totally not a race thing...)
> Zoe would work as Alice (yes, Alice from Wonderland [and other places])
> Ryze would work as the Sorcerer's Apprentice (or, hell, the Sorcerer himself, Merlin).
> LeBlanc could be Cora, I suppose.
> 
> And I've drawn a blank... Guess that's all, folks.

I watched a few eps of that but couldn't get into it.

I've always wanted a baywatch sivir.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K3Gn6X0f,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-24T20:46:16.331+0000)
>
> I watched a few eps of that but couldn't get into it.

Trust me, it gets better.

Like season 1 is nice and all, but when you really get down to it most of what season 1 is is about is setting up the rest of the series, and there's so much to see and enjoy. If I had to pick out a single story arc as my favourite, it would have to be the Underworld arc (second half of season 5). I really think that Greg Germann killed it as Hades, and I liked seeing a bit of a deviation from the "typical" villains of the series. Only thing is that the new season is a bit iffy, and, while I can't say for sure at the moment, it might have been better to leave it at the end of season 6.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=K3Gn6X0f,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-11-24T23:30:08.075+0000)
>
> Trust me, it gets better.
> 
> Like season 1 is nice and all, but when you really get down to it most of what season 1 is is about is setting up the rest of the series, and there's so much to see and enjoy. If I had to pick out a single story arc as my favourite, it would have to be the Underworld arc (second half of season 5). I really think that Greg Germann killed it as Hades, and I liked seeing a bit of a deviation from the "typical" villains of the series. Only thing is that the new season is a bit iffy, and, while I can't say for sure at the moment, it might have been better to leave it at the end of season 6.

I might revisit but I fear my backlog of TV is more than the hours I have left on earth.
I mean, have you not seen the copyrighted material already in the game?
